description: Add a refreshing burst of flavour to your weekly summer dinner menu with tasty seasoned chicken drumsticks on a platter of cucumber, olives, watermelon and feta.
name: Paprika & Chilli Chicken with Cucumber & Watermelon Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g boneless chicken drumstick fillets with paprika & chilli
1 Lebanese cucumber, thinly sliced into rounds
0.5 pkt South Cape Danish style fetta, crumbled into large pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Add chicken and cook for 5 minutes each side or until golden and cooked through. Transfer to a plate. Loosely cover with foil and rest for 5 minutes.
Meanwhile, heat a chargrill pan over medium-high heat. Cook bread, in batches, for 30 seconds each side or until heated through. Transfer to a plate. Cover to keep warm.
Thickly slice watermelon. Remove rind from watermelon and cut flesh into 4cm chunks.
Arrange watermelon on a platter with cucumber, olives, feta and dressing. Top with chicken and mint. Season with freshly ground black pepper. Serve with bread torn into large pieces.
